definition: to sell at a 50% discount/to fold in two
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
document folded in accordion form/to fold

sentences.english: Stitch the beak, folded in half, to the owl with your sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 把喙對摺，用縫紉機固定在身體上。

sentences.english: Then, you're gonna fold it in half once, lengthwise, lining up the edges, and really pressing down the seam.
sentences.chinese: 然後，你要把它沿縱向對摺，邊緣對齊，並壓平接縫。

sentences.english: This is a card and bill transpo that gets screams! A bill is borrowed, folded and placed into the spectators hand.
sentences.chinese: 向觀衆借一張鈔票，對摺後放到觀衆手中握緊。

sentences.english: Your store card is like a 50 percent-off cashmere coat.
sentences.chinese: 你的信用卡就像一件打對摺的羊毛大衣。

sentences.english: But we have a political system that has become allergic to compromise and practical solutions.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們擁有一個對摺中和現實解決過敏的政治系統。

sentences.english: If you fold the letter in two, it will fit into the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 你要是把信紙對摺，就可以裝進信封了。

sentences.english: All sports equipment is half off.
sentences.chinese: 所有運動裝備都打了對摺。

sentences.english: The dispersion effect of diffractive and refractive microlenses has been analyzed theoretically.
sentences.chinese: 對摺射和衍射透鏡的色散效應進行了理論上的分析。

sentences.english: Fold two 24-inch lengths of aluminum foil in half crosswise, and unfold.
sentences.chinese: 將兩張24英寸長的錫紙呈十字對摺，再打開。

sentences.english: The department store has reduced its prices by half.
sentences.chinese: 這家百貨公司把商品價格打了對摺。

sentences.english: The fold forms the back of the lamb and runs all along the tail.
sentences.chinese: 對摺的紙板就構成了羊羔的背和尾巴。

sentences.english: I felt cold and doubled the blanket over.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得冷，我把毯子對摺起來了。

sentences.english: fold the wire in half to create a sharp crease, then unfold.
sentences.chinese: 把鐵絲對摺做出摺痕，然後打開。

sentences.english: The paper also makes a strength check on the vertical plate in front and back under the horizontal beam.
sentences.chinese: 論文還對摺彎機架體下橫樑前後立板做了強度校覈。

sentences.english: No piece of square dry paper can be folded more than 7 times in half。
sentences.chinese: 任何一張乾燥的方型紙片都不能被對摺超過7次以上。

definition: variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]
to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party
to return something to its rightful owner
lit. to lead away a goat while passing by (idiom)/fig. to opportunistically pocket sb's possessions and walk off
